name: alderwoman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the US, Australia, and Canada, a woman who is an elected member of a city government: The alderwoman representing this ward has strongly supported the local history project. The resolution to fund the mural was introduced by Alderwoman Cynthia Hammond. Compare
alderman
More examplesFewer examplesA local newspaper reported on her voting record as an alderwoman.Alderwoman Julie Carter introduced a bill to give food-serving establishments the option to remain open until 2 a.m.Katie is a young St. Louis alderwoman.As a Chaska city alderwoman, she seconded a resolution approving the road improvements.
